dialogues.text: You don't need that junk! You see,  for thousands of years mankind has  been immolating, disemboweling, and  exploding itself. Why? Because we  have this built-in screwed up need  to go to war! So as a young man I  thought, why not have the fun and  excitement of war, without all that  unnecessary bloodshed. That's why I  have devoted my life to developing  an arsenal of highly sophisticated  non-lethal military weapons. (points to a hand  held tube) Air cannons... Blame throwers...  Feet seeking missiles... And perhaps  my ultimate invention... (picks up one of the  small cans) The canned tornado.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious groans, and the others share a look. This guy's r a nut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now here's a beauty! (picks up a purple  and orange sprayer  that looks like a  suped up water gun) I call it the Shrinker! I developed  it after years of studying the worst  dry cleaners I could find. It  instantly shrinks fabrics to half  their size. Anyone caught in its  spray is immediately immobilized by  their own clothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious turns and goes out, and the others start to follo But the Bowler picks up a canned tornado.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE THE BARN
dialogues.text: as Furious walks away, the Bowler steps out of the barn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Mister Bad Mood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious stops, turns back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulls the ring on  the can) Catch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tosses the can to him. He catches it -- just as a sma angry tornado FUNNELS out of the can. It catches Furious lifts him high in the air... then dissipates to nothing.. A beat later Furious lands on the ground with a painful t ON THE OTHERS, amazed. Furious gets to his feet, unhurt, but really pissed off. starts back toward the barn, violently kicking the empty  can. The others get out of his way, as, muttering angrily himself, he goes back into the barn... And emerges a moment later, toting the air cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got the air cannon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others think he's going to use it on them and scatter for cover. But Furious steps out into the yard, looking f a suitable target... He sees an old abandoned outhouse, p the air cannon to his shoulder, aims, and fires... There is a loud WHOOOOMPH of compressed air, and the huge recoil of the cannon instantly flings Furious back agains the wall of the barn. But the big rush of air hits the sh dead center... and BLOWS IT TO PIECES, leaving only the o seat. Furious gets up, dusts himself off, and moves to Doc Hell

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc, you're a genius! (hugs him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turns to the others) Okay! We got the firepower! I say we  throw it into the car, drive over to  Casanova's house, and kick some ass!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others ignore Furious and listen to the Sphinx.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are not yet ready. Now we must  learn to fight together... as one  thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others nod in agreement... while Furious fumes.

dialogues.speaker: MUSIC
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON DOC HELLER aiming his air cannon... CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL our heroes (minus Furious) standing in a p right behind him, holding him down. HE fires, and the rec jolts them all violently, but it doesn't knock them over. as half a dozen scarecrows are blown to pieces... Our her cheer and shake their fists... while Mr. Furious sits alo on the sidelines, drinking bourbon, and feeling very  alienated. VARIOUS SHOTS as our heroes learn to fight as a team...  crawling across the grass together... charging in a line. hurling canned tornadoes... while Furious sits it out,  brooding, drinking, and getting very jealous of the Sphin Shoveler, Bowler, and the Sphinx stand shoulder to should as Invisible Boy, Spleen, Raja, and the Doc throw small s at them... They deflect the pebbles with shovel, bowling ball, and  machete... Theyre having fun. They're becoming a team...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious drinks alone, while the rest of our heroes sit ar an old picnic table, feasting on sodas and pizza (like a  football team after a great practice.) Raja explains the  history of the situation to the Sphinx.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty years ago all the major  hoodlums of this city were united  into one great brotherhood of evil,  and Casanova was their king.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crime was rampant. It wasn't safe to  stay in your home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much less go outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Captain Amazing appeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He busted Casanova and sent the crooks  packing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this has been a pretty nice place  to live ever since.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pissed off) But now Casanova's back! And we're  gonna sit around here all night eating  pizza and telling stories! Hey, lets  toast some marshmellows!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wise snake coils before he  strikes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (lunges at the Sphinx) And a skunk stinks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious and the Sphinx square off, their faces only inche apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You drink too much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When are you going to take off that  mask?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointedly) When I am sure I am among friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (snapping at him) Go dance with your mother, Jeffrey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE RAJA, hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your rage is a very great power, but  it blinds you to your heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My heart died a long time ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is not dead. It is hiding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blow it out your bean hole, Pancho!...  And to hell with the rest of you!...  Look at you. Bunch of rejects. I  didn't need you before -- and I don't  need you now! (jumps on to his  motorcycle) The great ones RIDE ALONE! (kicks the engine  started) Adios, muchachos! (and he rides off  across the field)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE OTHERS, watching him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has he always been like this?

dialogues.speaker: FURIOUS
dialogues.text: the wind whipping against his face, as he rides his Harle at about a hundred miles an hour... The languorous sound an OLD DEAN MARTIN SONG is heard as we...

dialogues.speaker: MEMORY SEQUENCE
dialogues.text: as a little boy, sitting in the backseat of the family ca It is thirty years ago, and Mister Furious is a sweet, ve shy, well behaved, perfectly normal three year old. His M and FATHER sit in the front. Dean Martin is playing on th car radio. Little Furious looks out the window and sees t Mohave Desert going by. A sign reads "Las Vegas, 120 mile

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to husband) Oh this place looks great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An old sign reads "BAR" as the family car pulls into the  parking lot of a single adobe building out in the middle nowhere. They park.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now honey, you just wait in the car.  Mommy and Daddy will be right beck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get out, lock the car and head for the bar, leaving windows up. Little Furious watches them go, never suspect that his entire life is about to change. He sits quietly the backseat and plays with the little superhero figurine that he's brought with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pow! Bang! Wham!

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE BAR
dialogues.text: as the parents enter. A very Western motif. An old Gene A song is playing on the juke. The air conditioning is on.  They're the only customers in the place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nice and cool in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as they sit at the  bar) Barkeep, a couple of cold ones.

dialogues.speaker: CUT BACK AND FORTH BETWEEN CAR AND BAR -
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON THE MIDDAY SON - blazing down on the car... as Little Furious still plays with his superheroes, but t interior is starting to bake, and the sweat begins to pou off him. He looks out at the bar, getting worried. He tri the windows, but they're automatic and won't open... Back in the bar his parents down shots of bourbon with th beers, as the BARTENDER finishes telling them a joke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here's a banana for your monkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom and Dad have a good laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couple more?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE FROM OUTSIDE TUE CAR as Little Furious, sweat and t pouring out of him, his hair wet and sticking out (and  starting to take on that familiar look), pounds on the wi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy! Daddy! Mommy! Daddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as back in the bar his parents, now very drunk, down more beers and chasers as they play a spirited game of pinball

dialogues.speaker: THE MOHAVE SUN
dialogues.text: barely able to breath, Little Furious flops back onto the seat, his face a mask of heat and terror... But suddenly, change begins to take place in him, as some primordial de mechanism kicks in... and his fear begins to give way to  rage... His teeth bare.

dialogues.speaker: HIS HANDS -
dialogues.text: as they CRUSH the superhero figurines in their grasp... While back in the bar his drunken parents dance a slow tw step to Hank Williams "Your Cheatin' Heart"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as the big desert moon shines down on the family car, sti parked there.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE BAR
dialogues.text: The parents are asleep in a booth. Furious' mother wakes looks around groggily, and in a moment of horror suddenly remembers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OH MY GOD!

dialogues.speaker: THE PARKING LOT
dialogues.text: as she runs toward the car, hysterical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God! Oh my God! Oh my God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She unlocks the door, throws it open, and sees something  that makes her pull back in horror... Little Furious sits the backseat. His hair sticks out wildly, his face has be that now familiar mask of primordial rage. Another OLD DE MARTIN SONG is heard as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sitting alone in the booth, a look of profound pain and  lonliness on his face; he is still that little boy. The D Martin song is playing on the juke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up and sees Monica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone tonight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Armed Disco Boys guard the front entrance... While on the hillside above Invisible Boy (looking throug binoculars) and the Spleen lie together on their bellies the weeds, keeping the mansion under surveillance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a whisper) Adolescence was the worst -- The  other kids made fun of me, so I'd  spit on them and they'd scatter --  I've never had a girlfriend -- unless  you count that night with my cousin --  She recovered fully though -- We  exchange cards every Christmas --  Well, I send her one, and she sends  it back... (spritzes something  into his mouth, then  offers it to Invisible  Boy) Bug repellent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the gates of the mansion open and several sedan followed by a truck, drive out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova and Anabel sit in the front of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are they going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy hesitates for just a momnt, then gets up an runs down the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (runs after him) Kid!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the small convoy drives past, Invisible Boy slips out  from behind some trees, runs after the truck, jumps up an sits on its rear bumper. The Spleen comes running after h and Invisible Boy reaches out, grabs his hand and pulls h up alongside him. Invisible Boy tries the rear gate. It's open. The two of them pull it up just a foot, squirm insi then pull it closed behind them.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy flashes the light of his key chain flashlig around the inside of the truck. There is nothing in it, e for a large pile of packing blankets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as the convoy drives through Champion City's seedy waterf area and out onto a long pier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn Wong and Don Stouffer report the night's news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...still no sign of millionaire Lance  Hunt, and now, in an unrelated story,  another one of Champion City's leading  citizens has apparently disappeared.  Captain Amazing has not been seen or  heard from in a week. Authorities  believe that the hard working  superhero may just be taking a well  deserved rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cancun perhaps?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds good to me, Don.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Furious sits in the booth drinking coffee as Monica s him his burger and fries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (floundering) Monica... I was wondering if -- uh -- maybe we -- I mean you and I -- could -- uh -- you know -- get a -- I mean  have a...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Date?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get off work in fifteen minutes.  Walk me home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was easy. (goes back to work)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON FURIOUS, feeling a whole lot better.

dialogues.speaker: JUST OUTSIDE THE DINER
dialogues.text: from across the street. Furious' head is clearly visible the brightly illuminated window of the diner. A Disco Boy stands in the shadows, gazing at the diner; h recognizes Furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy has pulled up alongside a rusty old freighter, docked at the pier. Casanova's men throw the gate of the truck open, and the  CAMERA MOVES IN. No one is there, but we notice... two la lumps under the packing blankets. Casanova holds Anabel in his arms as they watch a large w crate being lowered from the deck of the freighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, our ship's come in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova's cellular phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE THE DINER
dialogues.text: The Disco Boy is on his phone. His pistol is drawn, and h got it aimed right at Furious' head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just give me the word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gets an idea) Wait. I'll be right there. (hangs up, starts off)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (peeved) Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Head hunting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A minute later Casanova and two or three Disco Boys drive off in one of the sedans... as the crate is loaded onto t truck, and the gate is pulled closed... and locked.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: The engine starts up, and the truck starts to move, as  Invisible Soy and the Spleen poke their heads out from un the packing blankets... They approach the crate and Invisible Boy shines his  flashlight on it. The crate is secured with rivets and thick metal bands;  there's no way they're going to be able to get inside it, but in the light of the flashlight they see... Faded red lettering, in Russian, and the distinctive old  hammer and sickle of the former Soviet Union.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious walks Monica home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I admire you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Being a superhero, wanting to save  the world. It's so... unselfish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most people just want to make money  or be famous or something. But you  risk everything, just to help people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment) I wouldn't mind being famous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who wouldn't?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the shadows behind them... Casanova follows, stalking  them, as silent as a vampire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never been able to figure out  what to do with my life, which is  why I guess I'm still a waitress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing wrong with being a waitress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your real name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you always lived here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too... I love this stupid old  town. It's noisy. It's smelly. It's  falling apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica, smiling, looking lovely. CLOSE 0N CASANOVA; he wants her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've thought of leaving, going to  Chicago or New York, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have they got that we ain't  got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Champion's going to bounce back, and  I want to be here when it does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't seem very angry right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shrugs. And they kiss, very tenderly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what? Underneath all that  anger I think there's just a little  boy who wants everyone to love him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just want to be a superhero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I mean... 'Night, Roy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and climbs the stairs of an old apartment build and goes inside, as Furious watches, feeling emotions he' not used to. He really likes her. He starts walking back  down the street, past a man sitting on the stoop. The man looks up. It's Casanova Frankenstein.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going my way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious is caught completely by surprise -- he takes a st ready to fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it easy -- take it easy. I just  want to have a little chat... That  was quite a number you did on my  car. You've got a lot of violence in  you... and I like that in a guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious, silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what the difference is  between good and evil, Roy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious reacts to the fact that Casanova knows his real n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evil is more fun. When you want  something, you just take it, and if  somebody gets in your way, you kill  them... You seem like a very  frustrated guy, Roy. Unhappy.  Unfulfilled. What is it that you've  always wanted, always desired? Because  whatever it is, I can give it to  you... Fame? (snaps his fingers) Easy. Fortune? Even easier. Women? (laughs) The easiest of all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON FURIOUS as, out of the corner of his eye, he cat movement in the alley across the street... he knows what is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll let you in on a little secret,  Roy. In two days this entire city  will belong to me, and there's not a  damn thing your little pals can do  about it. It's the perfect time to  switch teams... So what do you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly) You're nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (flairs) They always call the great ones nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the nuts always call themselves  great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (his psychosis showing) Are you with me... or against me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too bad. PLUG HIM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gunfire rings out from the alley as the Disco Bays step o their pistols blazing. But Furious has anticipated them. leaps right at Casanova, pins his arms in a bear hug and  holds him in the line of fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAIT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Disco Boys stop firing... Furious drags Casanova back into an empty lot, using him as a shield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Casanova) Thanks for reminding me which team  I'm on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So are you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious releases Casanova, then runs for it and leaps ove the wooden wall at the end of the lot... as the Disco Boy open fire again, and their bullets punch holes through th wall... Furious runs down a back street and escapes into the nigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy drives up the hill toward an ominous looking  structure (that we recognize from the model on the TV  interview with Casanova earlier.) A high central tower rises up out of the half completed  bulwarks of featureless concrete. It looks both totally m and completely ancient, but a profound sense of evil conn both themes beautifully. ANGLE ON A PLAQUE THAT READS... "Frankenstein Center for the Performing and Non-performin Arts". The gates of the center open, and the convoy passes throu

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy and the Spleen stand listening, waiting, as they feel the truck pull to a stop... A moment later the gate is pulled opened... Anabel is the with several thuggy looking SECURITY GUARDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful with my baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are two lumps under the packing blankets again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crate is being carried away by a forklift... A beat, then Invisible Boy and the Spleen slip out of the empty  truck... And run down the road back toward the gates... which are  still open. They're just about to pass safely through them, when a PA OF ARMED SECURITY GUARDS, step in their path, their guns  pointed at thern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They freeze, their hands held high.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you two doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes are mute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not talking, eh? That can be fixed.  Turn around, start walking up the  hill --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And no funny business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy and the Spleen turn, hands in the air, and  start up the hill, the guards right behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment, to  Invisible Boy, in a  whisper) Pinch 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy pinches his nostrils -- and the Spleen lets out with a horrendous fart. The guards gag and choke viol in the fumes as our heroes turn and run for it... escapin out the gates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy and Spleen report to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever was in that crate... is  from Russia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others consider this, then hear a familiar voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there room in the pack for one  more wolf?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up and see that Furious has just returned... Th Sphinx moves to him. For a moment they stand face to face

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wrong... I need my friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sphinx takes off his mask, revealing that he is the busbo from the Tacky Taco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amigo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace. A few minutes later. The others are gathered around Furio listening to his story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova said that in two days the  entire city would belong to him...  and there wasn't a thing that we  could do about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did he mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the window the moon is seen rising over the hills the Frankenstein Center silhouetted ominously against it. Raja, Shoveler, and Furious gaze at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe it's time we checked that place  out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how do we get in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment,  sounding very Sphinx- like) We just become like the wolf... who  wears the sheep's clothing.

dialogues.speaker: MUSIC
dialogues.text: CLASSIC DISCO ("Stayin' Alive" if we can get the rights) Furious, Raja, and Shoveler (in street clothes) walk down the street together and step into the doorway of... the  Salvation Army Thrift Shop... Later. CLOSE ON three pairs of legs, wearing polyester pa and vintage shoes (ala the classic shot from "Saturday Ni Fever")... CAMERA WIDENS TO REVEAL our three heroes, dres in full blown seventies attire (with vintage sunglasses), doing their best Travolta strut down the street... MUSIC CONTINUES as our heroes strut their way through the gates of the art center, right past the security guards..

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE THE CENTER
dialogues.text: They climb the long stairs toward the center, which looms above them... then pass through the big wooden doors and  into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: END MUSIC as our heroes move through a vast, but empty ma hall... A small army of heavily armed security guards mar about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where's the art?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hasn't stolen it yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This place is built like a fortress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because that's what it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hear a WILD BURST OF DRUNKEN LAUGHTER echoing throug the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (following the sound) Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They approach a doorway. The noise is coming from within.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as our heroes step inside and see... A big luncheon is in progress. Casanova, Anabel, and Tony P sit at the head ta The room is lined with banquet tables, which are filled w VICIOUS LOOKING CHARACTERS, drunk, eating, laughing, and  giving the waitresses a very rough tim..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned) Oh my God... Every crook in the city  is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bone Heads from the South Side...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THREE INSIPIDLY EVIL LOOKING GUYS in hip suits...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bland Boys from Downtown...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON A DARK HAIRED WHITE GUY dressed as a rapper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Italian Ice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON A GUY with a frightening assortment of metal things  piercing his face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Stapler...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Elvis Brothers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A more degenerate group of criminals never sat down to lu Furious recognizes one of the waitresses... It's Monica. Casanova's got his eye on her, too, and he remembers her  from the night before on the street with Furious. ON ANABEL, noticing his interest. Our heroes see Monica walking straight toward them. They  turn away, lean against a wail, trying to be totally  inconspicuous... But as she passes them, not noticing them... Casanova  approaches her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stops, turns to him, while our heroes listen in, only few feet away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reading her name tag) Monica... Beautiful name. It suits  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON FURIOUS, getting jealous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you won't take this the wrong  way, but I couldn't help but notice...  that you're a dead ringer for Veronica  Lake in "The Blue Dahlia".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious growls. Raja gives him an elbow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you an actress?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a waitress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You underestimate yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister Furious is fuming. The strands of his perfectly co disco-do start to stand straight up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I'm writing a play -- it's  just a little Broadway thing, but  there's a part in it that I think  you'd be perfect for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd love to hear you read it. Could  you stick around after the luncheon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure -- I guess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrific.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and walks into the kitchen. CLOSE ON CASANOVA, watching her; his intentions are  sinister... He turns and sees... our heroes, hanging by t wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you three doing here? This  is invited guests only. Out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes skulk out.

dialogues.speaker: JUST OUTSIDE THE BANQUET HALL
dialogues.text: as our heroes step out and breathe a sigh of relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was too close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we gotta find out what's going  on in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious has spotted... a large covered dessert table, wai to be wheeled into the hall.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE BANQUET HALL
dialogues.text: as the dessert table is wheeled in... and in a CLOSER ANG under the table cloth, we see three pairs of disco shoes  creeping along... A few minutes later, Monica steps up to the dessert table Suddenly, she is yanked under.

dialogues.speaker: UNDER THE TABLE
dialogues.text: Monica struggles, tries to cry out, but a hand is clamped firmly over her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She calms down, and he takes his hand off her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you guys doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The waitresses leave; the big doors to the dining room ar swung closed, and the cigars are lit. The meeting has beg Casanova takes the podium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you all for coming. I hope you  enjoy the cigars. I had to kill a  dozen Cubans to get them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tony P chuckles loudly, but the joke goes over like a lea balloon with the rest of the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty years ago, this town was yours!   AND I WAS YOUR KING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE HOODS, listening, bored, puffing on their cigars;  this is a sad old story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tragically) But they called me a psycho, and  they put me away. For twenty years I  rotted in my cell, painting  watercolors, writing haikus -- just  waiting for the day I could take my  revenge. Well, brothers, that day  has come!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON OUR HEROES under the table, listening. Monica begins t realize what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They thought I was crazy? Well the  joke's on them -- because tonight at  precisely midnight -- on the twentieth  anniversary of my tragic arrest --  every man, woman, and child in this  city is going to turn into a RAVING  PSYCHOTIC! Mothers will murder their  tots! Old ladies will strangle their  cats! Children will bump off their  babysitters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guests think Casanova's completely lost it. Italian I speaks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're outta your mind!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I beg your pardon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody could drive a whole city crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell you what, Ice. I'll make you a  friendly little wager. It I can't do  it... you can blow my brains out. If  I can, I'll blow out yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the hoods' interest has been perked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Anabel, with a  smile) Honey, give the boys a taste.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anabel puts on a pair of heavy duty sound deadening ear  protectors, then presses a button on a small remote contr device. ANGLE ON A SPEAKER, placed above the podium... as the air suddenly filled with a weird, stridulating, HORRIFIC NOIS (somewhere between the sound of a fire siren and a hornet trapped in your ear) and everyone in the room (except Ana goes COMPLETELY BERSERK... CAMERA PANS the tables as the guests laugh dementedly,  punching, gouging, strangling, and stabbing each other... Under the serving table our heroes go crazy... Casanova, in a state of psychotic ecstasy, whips out his  pistol and empties it into Italian Ice... who drops to th floor, dead. Anabel presses the button again; the sound winds down and stops, and everything returns to normal. The entire event lasted only a few seconds, but the guests are dazzled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was great!... What the hell was  that?... How did you do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova throws Anabel a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tonight, at midnight, that sound  will be amplified across this entire  city. Murder and mayhem will reign  supreme! And Champion City will be  ours again! This will be our castle!  And I will be our king! And there's  no one to stop us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a familiar voice is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast, Casanova!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of curtains suddenly part... and Captain Amazing  (looking a bit singed) is standing there in classic super pose. CAMERA PANS the crooks, as their criminal ecstasy turns  instantly to terror. They yank out their pistols, dive fo cover under the table, throw up their hands in surrender, etc... But Casanova just grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, fellas... (moves to Captain  Amazing, and puts  his arm chummily  around him) I killed him... and I've had him  stuffed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casaova reaches behind Captain Amazing's back and pulls a string (like the ones they used to have on those old talk dolls).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a canned voice) Isn't my butt cute in these tights? (pulls again) Blue is my color. (pulls again) Oh, my abs are killing me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crooks are beside themselves with laughter. ON OUR HEROES, under the table, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The King is back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Long live the King!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crooks fire their pistols exuberantly into the air, a disco music fills the air and Casanova dances, basking in their adoration... And our heroes slip out from under the table and make goo their escape...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes and Monica pow-wow, sobered by what they have  seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What could have made such a horrible  noise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment,  gravely) He's got the Psychostridulator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten years ago the Kremlin's top secret  Psychiatric Warfare Division developed  a prototype for a weapon that emitted  a fluctuating alternative frequency  noise that produced a violent  psychotic reaction in any mammal  within hearing distance. But when  the old Soviet Union fell the  stridulator and its brilliant  inventor, Doctor Kopov, disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This Kopov, what happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not him... her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They react to that piece of news, and then the Bowler ope up the newspaper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did she look like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON A PHOTO of Anabel and Casanova, announcing their wedding engagement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence; this is bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hopefully) Maybe it won't work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A village in Siberia was wiped out  when a cleaning woman switched it on  by mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another grim silence, as they realize how desperate the  situation is. For the first time, they're really scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to warn the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one will believe us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll think we're just a bunch of  weirdoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA CUTS BETWEEN THEM as they look at each other -- th frightened faces, their sad, faded costumes. Even the Sph looks scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment, grimly) We know what we gotta do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're outnumbered twenty to one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's suicide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe. But this isn't about living  or dying. It's about good versus  evil, and we're good, whether we  like it or not... Maybe we look a  little funny...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And smell a little funny. We're not  bulletproof and we can't fly. But  we're superheroes -- and that means  doing what's right -- even when it's  impossible... This is our city --  these are our friends, our families --  and if we don't save them, nobody  will! So I say we take a ride up  that hill, blast our way in there,  destroy that Psycho-whatchamabob --  and teach those deviants a lesson  they'll never forget!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds good to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we'll take a bunch of 'em with  us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all with him. Monica steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just want you guys to know -- I  may not be a superhero, but I'm with  you -- and I want to help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh that's great... Thanks, Monica...   (Etc.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could really use some coffee --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And some sandwiches --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With mustard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (her feelings a little  hurt) Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few minutes later, Monica serves sandwiches and coffee our heroes plan...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But that place is huge and we don't  know where this psycho thing is --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or even what it looks like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he must have it well hidden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll just have to get lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MONICA as she gets an idea. A moment later she slips a canned tornado into her purse... as the others put their  arms around each other in a group huddle\embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go do what you gotta do. We'll meet  back here at sunset... Do or die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do or die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victoria o morte.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEROIC MUSIC as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE FRONT GRILL of the Herkimer Battle Jitney... as Miste Furious hooks it up to the "Sally's Auto Demolition" tow  truck... A moment later he drives the tow truck, towing t off the lot, as Sally steps out of her office, pissed off

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE SPHINX, standing as immobile and silent as a statu as a falling leaf slowly flutters down in front of him... a flash, his machete slices through the air, and the leaf continues fluttering down, but in two pieces...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc Heller fine tunes his Shrinker spray... as the Bowler sits quietly in the hayloft, studying the old dog eared p of her father and herself as a little girl...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy stands in front of his mirror, eyes closed, concentrating for all he's worth, trying to become  invisible... He suddenly pops opens his eyes and looks at himself in the mirror... but he's still completely visibl He flops onto his bed in frustration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON A TABLE full of food... Eggplant Parmesan, brocc chili... CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL the Spleen sitting a in the booth, stuffing his face, gassing up for battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shoveler, standing in his bedroom, has just put on hi freshly laundered suit. CAMERA OPENS WIDE TO REVEAL Lucil his wife, standing there, holding his just polished shove He takes it from her, then takes her in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby, if I don't make it... find  yourself... a normal guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want a normal guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they kiss. A few minutes later... In the living room the Shoveler's  kids lie sprawled in front of the television. The Shovele in battle array, steps into the room. He wants to say  something to them, but the kids don't even take their eye off the TV look at him... He turns and walks out in silen END MUSIC...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shades are drawn. The Raja, in full costume, quietly  loads silverware into the secret pockets of his cape.  Suddenly, the light switches on... It's his mother. She's caught him red handed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jeffrey, YOU THIEF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother... it's not what you think!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And why are you wearing that silly  costume?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (painfully) Because... I'M A SUPERHERO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HIS MOTHER, shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Mother, I'm sorry. I know how  much you wanted me to be a doctor or  a lawyer with a family -- but it's  just not who I am!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... the silverware?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I use it... to fight evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment) Jeffrey... this is wonderful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned) It is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always knew that you were special.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever since you were a little boy... (gets an idea, excited) Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls down the stairway to the attic...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She switches on the light and leads the Raja to a far  corner... where she moves a couple of old hat boxes, REVE an ancient leather bound box with the word "Excalibur"  engraved in gold on the top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Raja opens the box and registers astonishment as he  sees... A FABULOUS VICTORIAN SILVER SET packed with formidable lo servers, cake knives, ice cream forks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Great Great Grandmother's wedding  silver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Raja lifts up and handles a large heavily engraved pi server.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitchin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister Furious, wrench in hand, covered with grease and o cussing to himself as he works under the hood of the Herk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try it again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy, sitting behind the wheel, tries the igniti of the Herkimer, and the old engine grinds as it turns ov but doesn't catch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, baby... Come on, baby... I  SAID COME ON!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister Furious SLUGS the engine with his fist, and it spu and backfires into life... shaking, rattling, leaking,  exploding, but running... Furious kisses the Herkimer... the Bowler calls out to him from the barn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mon Captain, it's for you. (tosses him the phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on a phone, speaking  very softly) It's me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica, where are you?

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO MONICA
dialogues.text: REVEALING that she is on a pay phone just outside the art center. She's wearing make-up and a sexy little dress; sh looks she's dressed for a date. Disco Boys and security g go about their business all around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the Frankenstein Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you nuts? Get out of there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Casanova may be a  supervillain, but he's got a weakness,  and I'm it. Maybe -- just maybe -- I  can trick him into showing me the  location of the whatchamathing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a psycho! He'll kill you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just shut up and listen. Hold off  the attack as long as you can. If I  can discover the location I'll call  you --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what if you get killed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then at least I will have died trying,  right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious silent, taken aback by her courage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy... We might never see each other  again, so I'd better tell you now...   I think you're wonderful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (caught completely  off guard) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bye. (and she hangs up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Monica approaches a GUARD standing by the main door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you tell Mr. Frankenstein that  Monica is here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, doll.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE BARN
dialogues.text: Furious stands by the Herkimer, phone still in hand. He s speechless, dazed. Something inside him has changed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (worried about him) Hey... you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE FRANKENSTEIN CENTER
dialogues.text: Casanova steps out and sees... Monica, looking very sexy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you'd chickened out on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just wanted to... powder my nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes roam all over her; he knows she's up to somethin but she looks yummy, and this is just the sort of cat and mouse game he loves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How 'bout giving me "the tour"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Casanova leads Monica across an open courtyard toward. the sheer walls of the imposing central tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leads her to a massive archway, the only apparent entr to the tower. But just as she is about to pass through, M looks up and sees something that makes her pull back with fear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A very sinister looking SECURITY EYE gazes down at her fr the top of the archway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry. It's not activated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass through and into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: which is filled with IMMENSE BRONZE SCULPTURES of voluptu scantily clad females in various poses of bondage. Monica reacts; these things are scary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the artist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bowler, Spleen, Invisible Boy, and Doc Heller load up the Herkimer with Heller's weaponry... as Mister Furious  lies sprawled on the hillside... breathing in the night a contemplating a dandelion gone to seed, and listening to sounds of the night. The Raja, Shoveler, and Sphinx, stan nearby, watching, trying to figure out what's wrong with  him. A whippoorwill is heard singing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. He's lonely... and he doesn't  care who knows it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raja and Shoveler share a bewildered look. The bird sings again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all the same really. Our songs,  our dreams, our seeds are all just a  brave attempt to live forever. (blows the dandelion  seeds into the wind)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is in love. His anger is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great timing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has Monica called?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova leads Monica into... a palatial room, filled wit priceless objects d'art, all of which reflect Casanova's  dark psyche. A Munch painting. Mayan idols. Weird German  furniture. A huge glass chandelier hovers over the room. massive bronze sculpture of a wolf (done in the same styl as the other sculptures) is perched in the balcony. It se to be howling out over the city which is seen in a specta view, spread out alonq the lakeshore below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where I come to... be alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns down the lights and quietly closes and locks the big door to the room. CLOSE ON MONICA, sensing her danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, look at that view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves out onto the balcony... as Casanova slips the g chain from around his neck and follows her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes have gathered around Furious, who sits in a ch getting the third degree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snap out of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on to yourself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting right in  his face) GET MAD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I just don't feel it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's turned into a completely normal  person!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Normal. What's normal? Does normal  exist? And if it did, how would we  know it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shoveler slugs him, sending him sprawling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, Eddie, that was really  uncalled for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gazing out onto the city, as she senses Casanova slinking behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm chilly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns, elegantly avoiding him, and moving back inside

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE BARN/LAB
dialogues.text: Spleen holds up Furious' favorite sunglasses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Your favorite sunglasses! (snaps them in two)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Roy Rogers coffee mug! (hurls it against the  wall)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Spiderman Pez dispenser! (breaks the head off  it)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, you win. I'm pissed off. I'm  seriously peeved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others groan with frustration.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE FRANKENSTEIN TOWER
dialogues.text: Monica moves nervously around the room as Casanova sprawl languorously on the bed, toying with his gold chain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not that kind of girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curiosity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with a smile) Remember the cat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, he hears high heels in the hall. A key is put i the lock -- Casanova leaps off the bed, grabs Monica and  roughly shoves her into the closet. He leaps back onto th bed, just as the door opens, and Anabel, dressed in a lab coat (and wearing high heels) enters. Casanova is complet relaxed, nonchalant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing all alone in the  dark?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fantasizing... about you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She crosses the room to the wolf sculpture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One last tweak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens a secret panel on its back, REVEALING a FLASHIN HIGH TECH INTERIOR... and Monica, watching from the close realizes that she has found the Psychostridulator.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE BARN/LAB
dialogues.text: a boom box... A CD jacket tells us that "Kenny G." is  playing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this doesn't do it, nothing will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON FURIOUS, a pair of headphones on his head. The music i so loud that we can hear it even though it's being played only through the headphones. ON THE OTHERS, gathered around him, waiting to see if thi will work. And then Furious begins to respond... as his face turns i a contorted grimace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's working!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious groans and writhes... The others are thrilled; th done it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This music is just SO BEAUTIFUL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to weep. The others give a collective groan of  defeat.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE FRANKENSTEIN TOWER
dialogues.text: as Anabel works on the Psychostridulator, Monica looks at clock... which reads almost eleven. Time is running out.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE BARN/LAB
dialogues.text: which also reads eleven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With or without him, we gotta go!

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE FRANKENSTEIN TOWER -
dialogues.text: as Anabel closes up the wolf... and starts to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our guests are waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be down in a jiffy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes out. Casanova listens as the sound of high heels fades away, then he goes to the closet and lets Monica ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd better go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a spy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (offguard) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw him walk you home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She makes a sudden try for the door, but he blocks her wa a cold look in his eye that makes her step back in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be afraid... I never hit a  lady...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lets the gold chain drop loose in his hand, then start coming for her, a sadistic grin on his face. This is the  real Casanova. Monica pulls back, then reaches into her purse and takes A CANNED TORNADO, which she holds out threateningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or you'll what? CAN ME?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He laughs dementedly as Monica pops open the can and A  SWIRLING FUNNEL OF AIR SHOOTS OUT OF IT and ENGULFS Casan throwing him across the room... Monica grabs the handset a cordless phone and runs out the door. ON CASANOVA, pulling himself together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Monica runs for it, dialing the phone on the fly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ringing... but no one is there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes are climbing into the Herkimer, whose noisy id engine obliterates the ringing of the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But she still might call!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you coming or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a chance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shoves him in the back, closing the heavy steel door b him.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE FRANKENSTEIN TOWER
dialogues.text: hiding behind a large planter... listening to the phone  ringing on the other end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, guys... Pick up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, we hear Casanova's voice on the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter...

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE TOWER ROOM
dialogues.text: Casanova is listening in on another phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody home?

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO MONICA
dialogues.text: as she moves quickly down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: The Shoveler is at the wheel. The Raja sits in the passen seat. The others are in the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He forces the stick into gear and the Herkimer lurches  forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got lift off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May the forks be with us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as the Herkimer -- backfiring, smoking, clanging -- rumbl down the driveway into action.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: Shoveler tries to put the car in second gear, but it won' go. He yanks and pulls and struggles, until the stick com off in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First is good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova instructs three security guards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want her alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Mr. Frankenstein.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA PANS UP the top of a staircase... where Monica is  crouched, listening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VARIOUS SHOTS as the Herkimer rumbles and smokes down  Champion's main street (in first gear) and the citizens s out of houses and bars to watch this bizarre sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy, what is that thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple of GRIZZLED CHARACTERS stand in front of a bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Herkimer? Those yuppies will drive  anything.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: ON FURIOUS AND THE OTHERS in the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amigo, we need you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just GET MAD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious closes his eyes and tries, but it's hopeless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sumptuous, hotel-like lounge. Anabel is holding court w all of top crooks from the luncheon, charming the pants o them... Casanova slithers up behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fellas, this is woman without whom I  would have gone sane. (kisses her neck)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of security guards (the same two who got gassed by the Spleen) are on duty, when they see... a strange looki vehicle chugging up the hill straight for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like... a Ford Dumpster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have a good laugh at it, then hold up their hands fo it to stop... But the Herkimer just rolls past them, hitt the iron gates and snapping them open as if they were mad of match sticks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They open fire.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: Bullets are heard pinging off the Herk as THROUGH THE  WINDSHIELD just ahead we see the long stairway heading up the front door of the art center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several more guards open fire, as the Herkimer hits the s and starts bouncing up them...

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE LOUNGE
dialogues.text: checking his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's showtime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then they all hear... the sound of gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE STAIRS
dialogues.text: as the Herkimer chugs and bounces... toward the entrance the center.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: Our heroes get bounced all over the place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as guards close and bolt the big wooden doors to the art  center. ON A GUARD wearing a headset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Frankenstein, we're being  attacked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova sits at a security console. Anabel, Tony P, and top crooks stand behind him, listening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By whom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't know!

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE STAIRS
dialogues.text: as the Herkimer climbs to the top, then rams into the doo with a thud. But the doors hold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll never get through those doors.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE FRONT DOOR
dialogues.text: But the plucky little Herkimer digs in its rear wheels an pushes against the doors like the Little Engine That Coul

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: as our heroes encourage the Herk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, baby!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it, big boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ITS WHEELS, grinding, chewing up the concrete...

dialogues.speaker: JUST INSIDE THE CENTER
dialogues.text: as the Herkimer comes crunching through the big wooden do of the center, scattering the guards.

dialogues.speaker: BACK INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: our heroes cheer, pat the Herk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atta, girl!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atta, boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Frankenstein, they're in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well kill them.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE HALL
dialogues.text: The Herkimer drives into the main hall of the center as a small army of security guards swarms in, guns blazing.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE SECURITY DESK
dialogues.text: Casanova and the crooks watch the security monitor...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HERKIMER
dialogues.text: The bullets sound like hailstones bouncing off the armor the Herk as our heroes grimly prepare themselves for batt The Sphinxs puts on his mask... the Bowler unzips her bag Doc Heller cocks his air cannon... Spleen and Invisible B load a bag with canned tornadoes... While Mister Furious  watches anxiously. The Shoveler drives intently, bullets splattering like bu on the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where am I going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing to an archway  on the other side of  the hall) Through there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But suddenly something under the hood blows up; the engin gives a long groan, and the Herkimer rolls to a dead stop

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE/OUTSIDE THE HERIKINER
dialogues.text: Right in the middle, in the most exposed position of the  main hall. More guards arrive and open fire... An armored golf cart  with a fifty caliber machine gun mounted on it comes spee into the hall, blasting the Herk... Inside, the sound of the big bullets is deafening as Shov tries to restart the engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No good! She's dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CASANOVA AND THE CROOKS, watching the monitor and laug as bullets pulverize the Herk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spam in a can!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crooks laugh. Butsuddenly, the Herkimer's door is thrown open, revealin our heroes -- holding down Doc Heller, his air cannon at ready. He fires -- there is a WHOOMPH of air -- and the  mounted gun and a dozen guards are sent tumbling...

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY DESK
dialogues.text: watching, sobered.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE MAIN HALL
dialogues.text: as our heroes come charging out of the Herkimer, using th various skills to blow through the surprised guards. Mr.  Furious comes out last, not quite sure what to do with  himself. But suddenly, a withering barrage of machine gun fire is  being laid down on them by three guards firing tommy guns from a balcony overlooking the floor. Bullets splatter al around them -- and several unlucky guards are hit -- but heroes dive for cover. The Raja tries to get off a fork, the firing is too intense. Our heroes are pinned down. ON MR. FURIOUS as he sees... the bag of canned tornadoes. He's got no superpowers, and he's scared to death, but he grabs a canned tornado.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cover me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullets dancing all around him, Furious runs a desperate  (but impressive) zig-zag pattern across the floor... He  performs a wild somersault, comes up on his feet, pops op the can, and executes a perfect jump shot, lobbing it rig into the balcony. The tornado funnels out, and the guards are sent flying. ON CASANOVA AND THE TOP CROOKS watching...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are those guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON CASANOVA, who knows who they are. WHILE BACK IN THE HALL our heroes rally around a shaken M Furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad for a normal guy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amigos!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do or die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the security eye watching... as the panicking security gu retreat under it into the main tower.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO CASANOVA -
dialogues.text: as he types something into the security computer... ON THE SCREEN a computerized image of the eye appears.  Casanova highlights the word "Activate" and then presses  "Enter".

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE COURTYARD
dialogues.text: as it comes to glowing, sinister life... A hapless guard retreats under the arch -- the Eye instan focuses on him, and he is hit by a dozen nasty looking la beams... that SIZZLE HIM... A moment later our heroes arrive at the arch. Furious is  about to run through, but Doc Heller holds him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to... a man shaped pile of charcoal, all that  remains of the unfortunate guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laser eye... and it's a humdinger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Raja takes out a butter knife, aims, and hurls it str at the eye, but laser beams intercept the knife and insta melt it into... a formless blob of silver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll take care of these clowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Piece a cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sweat.

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: as Tony P, the top crooks, and the Disco Boys march en ma TOWARD THE CAMAERA... They are an ugly, formidable lookin bunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes are blocked by the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc, there's got to be a way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the Doc is stymied... Suddenly they hear a woman's vo calling down to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's up here! It's up here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks up) Monica!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica leans over the edge of the balcony, the wolf sculp looming over her, shouting down at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROY! THE PSYCHO THING IS --!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But strong hands suddenly grab her. It's Casanova.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO FURIOUS
dialogues.text: as high above he hears Monica scream.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE BALCONY
dialogues.text: Casanova, hand held tightly across Monica's mouth, shouts down tauntingly to Furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Roy! She's just my type. You  can have her back... when I'm done!

dialogues.speaker: BACK T0 FURIOUS
dialogues.text: as he hears Casanova's evil laugh and Monica's scream. He desperate to find a way up, but the wall is completely sh He feels helpless -- frantic, near tears... FLASH TO the terrified little boy trapped in the back of parents' car, crying, pounding on the windows... And then... Mr. Furious' hands clench into fists -- his h stands up -- and his face turns into a mask of primordial rage. His button has finally been pressed. Be's MAD! He  reaches up as high as he can...

dialogues.speaker: HIS HAND -
dialogues.text: as his fingers literally dig into the concrete of the wal and he pulls himself up.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE TOP 0F THE TOWER
dialogues.text: Casanova throws Monica onto the bed, puts his hands on he throat and strangles her as she thrashes helplessly again his immense strength.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO FURIOUS -
dialogues.text: Fifty feet up and climbing. He pulls himself up, one hand then another, digging in his fingernails, catching his to on whatever tiny cracks he can find... as the others gaze at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll never make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think positive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Invisible Boy stands staring at the security e a look of fierce determination on his face. This is his  moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) I can do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a deep breath, closes his eyes, and concentrates ON FURIOUS as the fingers of one hand lose their grip and toehold gives way... For a desperate moment, Furious is  dangling off the wall by the tips of the fingers of one h Only his incredible rage keeps his fingertips taut. Suddenly, there is a flash of silver, and a large cake fo embeds in the concrete not far from his head. Furious gra hold of it, and throws a grateful look down to the Raja.. Who salaams up at him... As Invisible Boy, eyes closed in concentration, walks ver slowly, hands at his sides, in an almost Egyptian pose... toward the eye... which stares down mercilessly, waiting its next victim... we notice that Invisible Boy has becom just slightly transparent.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE TOP OF THE TOWER
dialogues.text: a look of pleasure on his face as he strangles Monica. He resistance fades. Her hands fall away. She is pale, beaut almost gone, a picture of exquisite death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (admiring her) Some girls just know how to die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, we hear someone cursing Casanova in Russian. He turns and sees... Anabel standing there, pistol in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You two timing psychotic bastard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darling, you've got the wrong idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (aiming at his heart) Do I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was only strangling her... I've  killed hundreds of women. It doesn't  mean a thing. (moving toward her,  turning on that old  Frankenstein Charm) Pootchkie, you're over-reacting.  This is our night. It's what we've  lied for... cheated for... murdered  for. She's just a plaything, a  trifle... You're the only woman who's  ever meant anything to me. I adore  you. I worship you. I want to make  you my bride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She succumbs to his charms, and he gently takes the pisto out of her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's just one thing... (with a psychotic  smile) I don't need you anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A look of terror comes across her face as she sees the mu in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Darling. I never hit a  lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: still climbing as he hears a scream, looks up... and sees Anabel go plummeting past him. ON OUR HEROES down below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA HOLDS ON OUR HEROES, wincing as Anabel hits with a ugly thud. Suddenly they hear Invisible Boy calling to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, I did it! I did it! I'm  invisible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all turn and see... Invisible Boy, totally visible, standing on the other side of the arch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you see me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid, turn that thing off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Invisible Boy turns and sees... a computer screen built i the wall (with the same image of the eye on it that was o Casanova's computer), but he doesn't have a clue how to t it off. Suddenly, he hears running feet, turns and sees.. The top crooks and the Disco Boys rushing towards him thr the giant sculptures. He gets an idea... and stands right front of the computer screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY! CREEPS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes a face at them -- and a dozen guns are instantly fired at him. He jumps clear behind a pillar -- as the bullets smash in the wall... one of them demolishing the computer screen.

dialogues.speaker: THE EYE -
dialogues.text: as it goes dead. ON INVISIBLE BOY, hiding behind the pillar... realizing h been shot in the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it! DO OR DIE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The villains form a line, bristling with pistols... as ou heroes, led by Sphinx, Shoveler, and Bowler come running  through the arch. The threesome go shoulder to shoulder ( our other heroes right behind them) as the villains open  fire, laying down a deadly fusillade... ON SHOVELER, BOWLER, AND SPHINX, standing together, defle their bullets with shovel, bowling ball, and machete... ( they practiced with pebbles at the farm)... with the Raja right behind them, hurling silverware... ON THE VILLAINS, rapid firing... but their own bullets  ricochet back into them, dropping them... They start to f back.
