dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE TOP OF THE TOWER
dialogues.text: Casanova is about to finish Monica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the light goes out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frankenstein!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casanova turns and sees... Furious, standing on the balco

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy... What took you so long?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious starts at Casanova, who aims Anabel's pistol at h Furious hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me guess... Bullets don't hurt  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hurt... BUT THEY DON'T STOP ME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious lunges at Casanova -- who gets off a shot before  Furious grabs the gun out of his hand. Casanova ducks cle Furious tosses the pistol away... then realizes he's blee from a shoulder wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smarts, doesn't it?... Shall we dance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns on his stereo and the sound of DISCO MUSIC fills the air...

dialogues.speaker: BETWEEN THE TWO FIGHTS
dialogues.text: Downstairs, the villains have regrouped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's rush 'em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They charge en mass at our heroes... who are waiting for  them... pinching their noses closed, the Spleen bent over their forefront... While Casanova dances around Furious like a cat... Furiou fighting the pain of his bullet wound, lunges at him, and Casanova neatly sidesteps him... The crooks and Disco Boys fall back, gasping, choking in noxious fumes... As Casanova attacks... Advancing shoulder to shoulder, fighting as a team, our h wield machete, fork, shovel, bowling ball, and canned  tornado... forcing the villains back... Casanova comes at Furious relentlessly, kicking and  spinning... and Furious gets the worst of it. Suddenly, a squad of Disco Boys comes charging at our her from the flank... but Doc Heller turns to face them, shri spray held Rambo-style on his hip. He lets them have it,  blasting them with a DENSE BLUE SPRAY... When the spray clears, the D Boys lie squirming on the fl prisoners in their now child sized disco suits...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help!... Get me out of this! (Etc.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Upstairs, Casanova pummels Furious... While, downstairs, the Shoveler dispatches the Elvis Brot with some nifty shovel work... But suddenly, the Bland Bo pistols blazing, are advancing on him, forcing him back  against the base of a sculpture. But the Raja suddenly leaps up onto the sculpture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bland Boys look up and see... the Raja, both hands fi with silverware... which he HURLS... A beat later the Bland Boys, bristling with forks and  grapefruit spoons, run screaming through the sculptures.. as Tony P, pistol in hand, skulks out from behind a sculp and spots... the Bowler. Upstairs, Furious goes flying against a wall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy, you're making this too easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Tony P takes a careful bead on the Bowler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say hello to Daddy for me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens fire, but she goes instantly into her ball swing frenzy... He fires, missing -- she's too fast to keep a bead on...  Finally, his gun clicks empty. She turns and faces him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grimly) Daddy says hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She HURLS the ball at him -- like a fiery softball pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: going straight for Tony P's SCREAMING head... ON THE BOWLER, watching -- as Tony's scream is cut short a gruesome thud. Back upstairs Casanova comes at Furious again... but Furi ducks the kick, pops back up and smashes Casanova with hi good arm... sending him flying across the room... Casanov recovers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's change the tune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches into his pocket and takes out the remote devic (that Anabel used at the luncheon). He presses a button.. ON THE WOLF SCULPTURE as the jaws open, its eyes glow red and the dreadful sound of the Psychostridulator grinds up and FILLS THE NIGHT AIR LIKE A SIREN. Downstairs, the foul noise fills the room and our heroes the villains all go into a full blown psychotic episode.. The villains start shooting and stabbing each other.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: On Main Street cars slam into each other. Pedestrians sta screaming and fighting... A man and his dog snarl and sna at each other... The Customers at the Lakeside Diner go insane, hurling pl and food... At the Shoveler's house the kids turn psycho in front of television...

dialogues.speaker: A TYPICAL SUBURBAN NEIGHBORHOOD -
dialogues.text: as the sounds of screaming and smashing dishes and furnit can be heard coming from all the houses...

dialogues.speaker: CHAMPION CITY -
dialogues.text: as a din of collective insanity rises up from the city...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE TOP OF THE TOWER
dialogues.text: in full psychotic ecstasy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT A RUSH! (tosses the remote  off the balcony)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MONICA, still motionless on the bed... Casanova and Furious collide in the center of the room an grapple in a contest of psychotically enhanced superhuman strength... Casanova gets his hands around Furious's thro and crushes it... Furious drops to his knees, and Casanov thinks he's got him. But Furious, grimacing with rage, lo him right in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (raspy voiced) Is... that... all you got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furious grabs Casanova's wrists... and crushes them. Casa howls with pain, loses his grip. Furious slugs him, again and again... then he grabs Casanova by the belt, swings h around, and HURLS him into the air... Casanova CRASHES into the huge crystal chandelier -- ther is an explosion of crystal and glass. Furious averts his  eyes as cut glass rains down all around him... then he lo up and sees... Casanova's gold chain has hooked onto a fixture of the  chandelier. Casanova kicks and flails... as he is hanged by the neck his own gold chain... Furious moves to the wolf sculpture. Be PLUNGES HIS HAND  through its bronze casing, and RIPS OUT the heart of the  Psychostridulator, a flashing football sized device that  gives off an unamplified, but higher pitched and more  irritating sound... Furious HURLS the device hard against the floor, and it  smashes into a thousand pieces...

dialogues.speaker: ONE OF THE PIECES -
dialogues.text: In insect sized device that gives off an even higher pitc even more disorienting sound. This is the very nerve cent of the Psychostridulator... Furious lifts his foot and crushes it hard under his heel SILENCE... Furious drops to his knees, wounded, exhausted... He look up... at Casanova, who dangles lifelessly off the  chandelier...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice dancing with you.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: as our other heroes return to their senses amidst the  vanquished crooks... the traumatized remnants of whom run for it. Things also return to normal... On the street... At the Lakeside Diner... And at the Shoveler's house...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO THE TOP OF THE TOWER
dialogues.text: Furious moves to the bed, where Monica lies motionless an pale...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He touches her face, her eyes open, and she looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're beautiful when you're angry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes her tenderly in his arm... as the Raja, the Shov and the others rush into the room and see... Furious and  Monica embracing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police cars and news vans arrive... as our heroes, batter wounded, but victorious walk proudly down the long stairs Furious and Monica hold each other up. Wounded Invisible has his arm around the Spleen... while policemen and news people run up the stairs past them into the center, ignor them as always... But this time our heroes could care less. They are  superheroes, and they don't give a damn who knows it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as the Raja opens the door and enters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mama!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is there, waiting up for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don Stouffer is reporting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Few details have emerged...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE SHOVELER'S KIDS, on the couch, still rattled by th psychotic episode, glued to the TV -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but the Dawn Patrol got this  exclusive interview with two of the  suspects.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE TV -
dialogues.text: Dawn Wong interviews the battered, handcuffed Elvis Broth as they are led away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who those guys were --  but I never want to see 'em again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Especially that big dude with the  shovel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (near tears) He was the worst!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE KIDS' COLLECTIVE REACTION as they realize who it w and then they hear the front door open... In the front hall the Shoveler enters wearily; his should hurts, his back is killing him... as his kids come runnin to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad!... Dad!... You okay?... You  hurt?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shocked by this  welcome) I'm okay -- I'm all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lean on me, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll hold your shovel, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lead him back into the living room, and give him the prime spot on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want a soda, Dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned) Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs to get it as Eddie Jr. slides a footstool under h feet and Tracy puts a pillow behind his back. Roland, the little one, cuddles up next to him, puts his arm around h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice work. Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Roland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really are a superhero, aren't  you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shoveler nods. A few minutes later... The Shoveler si on the couch, feet up, soda in hand. The television is of His kids all huddled around him, hanging on his every wor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's when the engine blew up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LUCILLE as she comes in and sees... her husband surrou by his kids, a happy man at last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sitting between the Bowler and a bandaged Invisible Boy. Bowler has her arm chummily around the Spleen's shoulder. The Spleen finally has real friends. Doc Heller discusses the art of fork throwing with the Raja as the Shoveler li in. The Sphinx sits at the end of the table, silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're never actually conscious  of range or trajectory?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heck no. I just chuck 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monica (in her waitress outfit) sits close to a bandaged  Mister Furious.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE TV -
dialogues.text: Dawn Wong reports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been twenty-four hours since  the deadly psycho-sonic attack and  bloody shoot-out that left Casanova  Frankenstein and dozen of the city's  top hoodlums dead... But tonight the  question remains... Who were these  heroic mystery men who saved our  city?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could have been anybody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute... That's it. That's  our name. We're... the Mystery Men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all like it, except for the Bowler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, do I look like a Man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well we can't call ourselves the  Mystery People.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing, ala "Macho  Man") Mystery, Mystery Man... I want to be  a Mystery Man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eat your mustard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter what we call  ourselves. We know who we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Obie-wan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... he's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others see... that the Sphinx's chair is empty. Raja  spots a crumpled napkin on the table, opens it up, and re

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Until you need me again... Adios."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A silence... Reactions from our heroes as they realize th the Sphinx is gone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I miss him already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, somewhere in the night, a burst of gunfire and  screams are heard. THE FINAL MUSIC BEGINS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amigos, duty calls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mystery Men wolf their burgers, then stand and start the street... As Monica watches them leave, a PATRON asks her:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss... who are those guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a moment) I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: JUST OUTSIDE THE DINER
dialogues.text: HEROIC GROUP SHOT as the Mystery Men march down the middl of street, toward the sound of the gunfire... and into th night. THEME AND CREDITS...
